workshoptitle: A Deep Dive Into Kubernetes using OKE - From Zero to Day 2 Operations

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare your tenancy
tutorials.description: Confirm resource availability, get to know Cloud Shell, and provision an auth token

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Deploying Infrastructure / OKE
tutorials.description: Use Terraform with Resource Manager to deploy OKE and requisite network resources

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Deploy Apps plus Ingress Controller
tutorials.description: Deploy the sample applications and the NGINX ingress controller

tutorials.title: Lab4: Working with Virtual Nodes
tutorials.description: Deploying and managing an OKE cluster with Virtual Nodes

tutorials.title: Lab5: Operational Best Practices - Overview
tutorials.description: Review some of the key capabilities, such as taints & tolerations, pod scaling, resource limits, and more

tutorials.title: Lab5a: Ops - Horizontal Scaling
tutorials.description: Setting up and enacting horizontal pod auto scaling

tutorials.title: Lab6: Security and Observability of Kubernetes with OKE
tutorials.description: Leveraging built-in and 3rd party tools to monitor resources and enforce security best practices

tutorials.title: Lab7: Automating OKE App Deployment with OCI DevOps
tutorials.description: Streamlining app build and delivery with OCI DevOps service

tutorials.title: Lab8: Cleaning up your tenancy
tutorials.description: Clean-up and remove all deployed resources
